text:
He’s given me a few masterclasses, mainly on compositing and on-set supervision.

I really want to work on Env over the next few months so will probably stick to that rather than coding yet, Python will be good to learn once I have learnt my Env skills a bit better. I want to try all sorts of Envs really but I love Sci-Fi and cool, crazy looking things. When you say find a concept on ArtStation, do you mean find some drawings that someone has done to then build an env from? 
Yes I’ve heard that cinematics are more done in other parts of Europe so maybe that’s something for later on in my career...
